steps.code: const name = document.querySelector('h1, .data-header__headline-wrapper')?.textContent?.trim() || ''; const info = {}; document.querySelectorAll('.info-table .info-table__content, .spielerdatenundfakten li').forEach(el => { const label = el.querySelector('.info-table__content--regular, span:first-child')?.textContent?.trim()?.toLowerCase() || ''; const value = el.querySelector('.info-table__content--bold, span:last-child')?.textContent?.trim() || ''; if (label) info[label] = value; }); const value = document.querySelector('.tm-player-market-value-development__current-value, .dataMarktwert a')?.textContent?.trim() || ''; return { name, info, market_value: value, url: window.location.href };
